rules.justification: fields outside 50000..99999 range on table extensions
the local record should be modified before saving to the database
a Tooltip should not be neccessary
placeholders should have a comment explaining their content
AppSource properties like 'brief', etc. are not needed on customer projects
AppSource property 'url' is not needed on customer projects

The ID range '[50000..53000]' is not valid. It must be within the range allocated to the partner for AppSource, within the range '[1000000..75999999]' allocated to AppSource applications, and outside the range '[50000..99999]' allocated to per-tenant customizations.
The compilation target is set to 'OnPrem', but it must be set to 'Cloud' or 'Extension'.
App.json 'target' property must not be set to 'Internal' or 'OnPrem'
The name of %2 is not valid. The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
